attendance.title: Attendance
attendance.subtitle: Manage your session attendance and view history
attendance.pleaseConfirm: Please confirm your attendance for this session.
attendance.cannotConfirm: This session has already ended. Attendance confirmation is no longer available.
attendance.autoMarkedAbsent: This session has ended and you have been automatically marked as absent.
attendance.confirmMessage: Your attendance needs to be confirmed for this session.
attendance.noSessionsDesc: You don't have any approved sessions scheduled for today.
attendance.noSessionsMessage: Visit the calendar to view upcoming sessions or reach out to your coordinator for more opportunities.

notifications.volunteerInfoNotAvailable: Volunteer information not available. Please refresh the page.
notifications.sessionAlreadyEnded: Cannot confirm attendance - the session has already ended.
notifications.attendanceAlreadyRecorded: Attendance already recorded for this session.
notifications.errorConfirmingAttendance: Error confirming attendance. Please try again.
notifications.errorCancellingAttendance: Error cancelling attendance. Please try again.

attendance.sessionCompletedDesc: This session has been completed successfully.
attendance.noPastSessionsDesc: You don't have any completed sessions in your history.
attendance.noPastSessionsMessage: Your completed sessions will appear here once you start attending.
attendance.youAttended: Great job! Your attendance has been recorded.
attendance.youCancelled: You have cancelled your attendance for this session.
